Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 24th overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1974...
Injured on 4/15/1974 with a Bruised Wrist, out for one week...
Traded from Boston (FBA) to Troy on 1/31/1975 (Going to TRO: P M. Roleke, C M. Richins, P W. Cerda. Going to SHP: 3B R. Hughes)...
Injured on 5/5/1975 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 4/9/1979 with a Broken Jaw, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 8/30/1979 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1981, off Elly Mae Clampett (PON)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/25/1981, off Mike Roleke (PEN)...
